Our services may contain third party tracking tools from our service providers, that include Google Analytics, Facebook Analytics for Apps and Crashlytics.
Such third parties may use cookies, APIs, and SDKs in our services to enable them to collect and analyze user information on our behalf.

The third parties may have access to information such as your device identifier, MAC address, IMEI, locale (specific location where a given language is spoken), geo-location information, and IP address for the purpose of providing their services under their respective privacy policies.
Our application includes social media features, such as the Facebook Like button and widgets, such as the Share button.
These Features may collect your IP address and may set a cookie to enable the feature to function properly
The advertisers may collect and use information about you, such as your service session activity, or your Google advertising ID.
We may feature advertising within our service.
